name: JUMP (itch) (STEALTH FOX GAMES)
description:
After Working On My First Ever Complete Game, I Started Working On My Second Game! It Has Been Off And On Development For Months Now And I No Longer Have The Motivation To Add More Features Or Levels To It. So I'm Finishing It up And Releasing It To The Public. I Know That Not A Lot of People Will Play This Game, If Any. But It Feels Good To Have Another Completed Game Under My Belt. (This Game Was Made With The Help of Shaun Spalding's Complete Platformer Series!) If Anyone Does Play This Game, Thank you! And If You End up Enjoying The Game, Feel Free To Give Me A Follow!

I Would Love To Hear Some Feedback In The Comments!

---------------------------------------------------------------------

CONTROLS:

(A & D) or (ARROW KEYS) --- Move Left And Right. 

(W) or (UP ARROW KEY) or (SPACE BAR) --- Jump.

(LMB) --- Shoot Gun.

(R) --- Restarts Level.

(ESC) --- Returns To Main Menu.

---------------------------------------------------------------------

STEPS TO PLAY THE GAME:

1. Download The Zip File(20Mb)

2. Extract The Folder Inside.

3. Run The Executable.
